title: Fun job in Macau
text:
Local Real Estate Cars For Sale 
Want to know what it's like to work as the Senior Manager of VIP/Celebrity Relations at The Venetian Macau? 
Here's an interview with Reggie Martin, whose job allows him to rub shoulders with the world's most influential people such as Arnold Schwarzenegger, Nicole Kidman and Sylvester Stallone. 
Reggie Martin comes in contact with celebrities, politicians, famous CEOs and royalty every day. And his job is to make sure they are waited on hand and foot from the minute they arrive. 
Read my interview here for the inside scoop on looking after celebrities at The Venetian Macau .
